Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Garfield/King Drive
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, King Drive, 51st and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near Garfield/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, King Drive, 51st and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near Garfield/King Drive.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
